intro: Tayotum nigrescens, commonly known as black tayotum, is a species of flowering plant in the family Malvaceae. It is native to tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil and Peru. The plant is characterized by its dark purple to black flowers, which bloom in clusters. It thrives in moist, shaded environments and is often found in humid forests. Due to its unique appearance and medicinal properties, it is of interest to botanists and herbalists alike.
